bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu han li 虛寒痢 , depletion-cold free-flux illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gang tie 鋼鐵 quotes Ren cun tang jing yan fang 仁存堂經驗方 : 虛寒下痢：腸滑不禁。針砂七錢半，官桂 一錢，枯礬一錢，為末，以涼水調攤臍上下，縛之。當覺大熱，以水潤 之。可用三四次，名玉胞肚 , “In the case of depletion-cold discharge with free-flux illness , the intestines experience a smooth passage that cannot be stopped. Prepare a powder of zhen sha , 7 ½ qian , guan gui , 1 qian , and ku fan , 1 qian . Mix it with cold water, smear it on the region above and below the [patient’s] navel, and bandage it. When he has a sensation of massive heat, moisten it with water. This can be applied three or four times. It is called ‘jade embraced abdomen ’”.
